front.title: Segment Routing BGP Egress Peer Engineering over Layer 2 Bundle

abstract.t: There are deployments where the Layer 3 interface on which a BGP peer session is established is a Layer 2 interface bundle. In order to allow BGP-EPE to control traffic flows on individual member links of the underlying Layer 2 bundle, BGP Peering SIDs need to be allocated to individual bundle member links, and advertisement of such BGP Peering SIDs in BGP-LS is also required. This document describes how to support Segment Routing BGP Egress Peer Engineering over Layer 2 bundle.
